append.xpath: //entity_class[starts-with(@name,'zombie') or (starts-with(@name,'zombieHells'))][not (starts-with(@name,'zombieTemplate')) and not (starts-with(@name,'zombieSpider')) and not (starts-with(@name,'zombieSteveCrawler')) and not (contains(@name,'FatCop'))]
